title: All-Purpose Crumble Topping
ingredients: ⅓cup packed light brown sugar (2.3 oz / 65g)
10tablespoons unsalted butter (5 oz / 142g), cut into ½-inch pieces, chilled
directions: Make the crumble: In a medium bowl, toss together the flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt until combined. Add the butter and toss to coat, then use your fingertips to work the butter into the flour mixture until no visible pieces of butter or floury spots remain. It should naturally clump together and hold its shape when squeezed. Cover and refrigerate the crumble until ready to use.
